energy.usef.core.service.business

Class ParticipantDiscoveryService

  • java.lang.Object
    • energy.usef.core.service.business.ParticipantDiscoveryService

  • public class ParticipantDiscoveryService
extends Object
    Service class in charge of the discovery of the participants on the network when a message arrives.

      • discoverParticipant

        public Participant discoverParticipant(Message incomingMessage,
                                       ParticipantType participantType)
                                throws BusinessException
        Discover the USEF participants matching the incoming Message sender.
        Parameters:
        incomingMessage - - Message
        participantType - the ParticipantType.
        Returns:
        a Participant given the domain given in the incoming message and the ParticipantType.
        Throws:
        BusinessException

                              throws BusinessException
        Find the unsealing public key of the message sender.
        Parameters:
        incomingMessage - - Message
        Returns:
        a Base64 encoded public key ( String )
        Throws:
        BusinessException

      • findParticipantInDns

        protected static Participant findParticipantInDns(String domain,
                                                  USEFRole participantRole)
                                           throws BusinessException
        Checks whether a participant is found in the list of real participants.
        Parameters:
        domain - - String containing the participants's domain.
        participantRole - - USEFRole indicating the participant's role.
        Throws:
        BusinessException - if no participant is matching the sender.
